sentences.chinese: 胃者，言陽氣就藏，皆胃胃也。
sentences.literal: Wei ones, speak yang qi approach hide, all Wei Wei also.
Lou ones, call ten thousand things moreover enter it also.

sentences.chinese: 奎者，主毒螫殺萬物也，奎而藏之。
sentences.literal: Kui ones, govern poison sting kill ten thousand things also, Kui and hide it.
Ninth month also, pitchpipe middle Wu She.

sentences.chinese: 無射者，陰氣盛用事，陽氣無餘也，故曰無射。
sentences.literal: Wu She ones, yin qi flourish use affairs, yang qi no remainder also, therefore called Wu She.
Its at twelve branches is Xu.

sentences.chinese: 戌者，言萬物盡滅，故曰戌。
sentences.literal: Xu ones, speak ten thousand things exhaust extinguish, therefore called Xu.

sentences.chinese: 律數：九九八十一以為宮。
sentences.literal: Pitchpipe numbers: nine nine eighty one to make palace.

sentences.chinese: 三分去一，五十四以為徵。
sentences.literal: Three parts remove one, fifty four to make zheng.

sentences.chinese: 三分益一，七十二以為商。
sentences.literal: Three parts add one, seventy two to make shang.

sentences.chinese: 三分去一，四十八以為羽。
sentences.literal: Three parts remove one, forty eight to make yu.

sentences.chinese: 三分益一，六十四以為角。
sentences.literal: Three parts add one, sixty four to make jiao.
